com.google.common.io

Class LimitInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • com.google.common.io.LimitInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    Use ByteStreams.limit(java.io.InputStream, long) instead. This class is scheduled to be removed in Guava release 15.0.

    @Beta
@Deprecated
public final class LimitInputStream
extends FilterInputStream
    An InputStream that limits the number of bytes which can be read.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Charles Fry
